title: Wts: T206 eddie collins old mill! No name top and bottom! SOLD
author: CMIZ5290

posts.post_title: Wts: T206 eddie collins old mill! No name top and bottom! SOLD
posts.post_content: Card is graded sgc 20 but looks close to a 7. There is no name showing on top, and only microscopic faint tips of a couple of the letters at the bottom. Hard even to see with the naked eye. sharp corners, this card appears to be extremely harshly graded by sgc. Detailed scans available, just shoot me your email. Priced at $350....thanks  CARD IS SOLD
